posts.post_title: FT: 1887 Old Judge George Rooks - Chicago Maroons
posts.post_content:
I have the following George Rooks available.  Its from the VERY rare Chicago MAROONS team.

The card has been rebacked but has AMAZING picture quality!

I would like to trade for T216s (PSA or SGC)
